bug.short_desc: Upgrade path broken for F-25 -> 26 with -markdown subpackage
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: geany-plugins-markdown subpackage has broken upgrade path. F-25 has geany-plugins-markdown-1.30-1.fc25.x86_64 but F-26 does not have geany-plugins-markdown due to bug 1375807 , and geany-plugins-common.fc26 obsoletes only for geany-plugins-markdown < 1.29, so it does not obsolete geany-plugins-markdown-1.30-1.fc25
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): geany-plugins-common-1.30-1.fc26 geany-plugins-markdown-1.30-1.fc25
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. From F-25, do # yum-depretated --releasever=26 upgrade 2. 3.
Actual results: Error: Package: geany-plugins-markdown-1.30-1.fc25.x86_64 (@updates-testing/25) Requires: geany-plugins-common = 1.30-1.fc25 Removing: geany-plugins-common-1.30-1.fc25.x86_64 (@updates-testing/25) geany-plugins-common = 1.30-1.fc25 Updated By: geany-plugins-common-1.30-1.fc26.x86_64 (fedora) geany-plugins-common = 1.30-1.fc26
Expected results: geany-plugins-common 1.30-x.f26 should obsolete geany-plugins-markdown.fc25
Additional info:
geany-plugins-1.30-2.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-8218f73ba8

geany-plugins-1.30-2.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-8218f73ba8
geany-plugins-1.30-2.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
